pageProduct.name: Thompson's Astraforte 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Astraforte 200ml Supports healthy immune function

Thompson's Astraforte is formulated with Astragalus which has traditionally been used in Chinese medicine to support a healthy immune system, manage mild upper respiratory tract infections, help relieve symptoms of coughs and colds, tonify the lungs and help maintain general wellbeing.

Size: 200ml

Alcohol Free?: No

KEY FEATURES

• Astragalus has traditionally been used in Chinese medicine to support a healthy immune system
• Manage mild upper respiratory tract infections
• Relieve symptoms of coughs and colds
• Tonify the lungs
• Maintain general wellbeing

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice. Contains Contains ethanol.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each 2.5ml contains:
Herbal extracts equiv. to dry:
Astragalus membranaceus (Astragalus) root 1g (1000mg)
Ligustrum lucidum (Privet) fruit 500mg
Ganoderma lucidum (Reiishi) mushroom 500mg

Directions

Store below 30C in a dry place
Keep out of reach of children.
Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
